comments.body: not a blocker, but we might want to make 'makedirs_safe' (to be renamed) a common function in module_utils (currently in lib.ansbile.utils.path) as its almost the same as this code.

For now I'm just going to leave it. Making `makedirs_safe` actually safe would probably involve a whole other discussion in what constitutes safe when it comes to permissions. That should be done when the security concerns mentioned above are worked on. For now I just want to fix the race condition when the dir is created.
